ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:1}); // Kotch
“All right, ladies!”{PAUSE}“Line up in front
of the Don!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Don Corneo
“Hmmm!
Good, splendid!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Don Corneo
“Now, let's see…
Which girl should
I choose?
Hmm---hmm---!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Don Corneo
“Or this one?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Don Corneo
“Woo-hoo,
I've made up my mind!!”{PAUSE}“My choice for tonight is…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Don Corneo
“This healthy-looking girl!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“Wa, wait a sec!
I mean, uh, please wait a moment!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Don Corneo
“Woo-hoo!”{PAUSE}“I love chickies who play
hard-to-get! Yeowza!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Don Corneo
“You can have the rest!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Don Corneo
“Shall we go, my pretty?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // Don Corneo
“This slender little girl!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Don Corneo
“You can have the rest!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Don Corneo
“Shall we go, my pretty?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Don Corneo
“This little beauty!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Don Corneo
“You can have the rest!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Don Corneo
“Shall we go, my pretty?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // “Yes, sir!
Thank you sir!”

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Aeris}
“Don, you've got
great taste.”
